name: Soviet Space Mission[GDL JAM]
description:
This game was made over the Easter weekend, for the GDL Brickbreaker jam. Do not click multiplayer unless you have a server running, otherwise the game will crash! Have fun!

Since the Jam has ended I've uploaded a more polished, working version of the game, have fun!

PVP MODE - If you hit the other player with your ball you win!!

In order to play multiplayer one player must host a server and both players must connect using the SSM.exe download below!
